messages.content:
Hey all you stylish people, 

The Fabulous s.Oliver 30%, 50%, 70% Sale is on and we have an exciting challenge for you :-P

Simran Arya, Junior Fashion Editor, Elle Magazine visited the s.Oliver store at Select City Walk over the weekend for the 30% 50% 70% Sale! She stepped in at s.Oliver with Rs.10,000 and walked out with 12 s.Oliver pieces! She just couldnât believe that in a 10 grand budget she was able to splurge on one of her favourite brands.

Simran was so excited that she decided to challenge all s.Oliver India fans with â Beat Simranâs Sale Score Challenge!â. To compete with Simranâs challenge, all you got to do is visit an s.Oliver store, buy goodies worth Rs. 10,000 or more at the s.Oliver SALE and beat Simranâs score of shopping for 12 s.Oliver pieces. If you are able to beat the 12 piece score, Simran will go dutch* with 2 lucky participants!

For details on terms & Conditions click here: http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=184765491584762

Participate now! 

Cheers
Team s.Oliver
